conclusion: The problem asks if the distance fallen during the 0 to 10 seconds interval is greater than 100 meters or less than 100 meters.
The v-t graph shows velocity on the y-axis and time on the x-axis.
At t=0 seconds, the velocity is 0 m/s.
At t=10 seconds, the velocity is approximately 20 m/s.
The area under the v-t graph from 0 to 10 seconds represents the distance fallen.
The area under the graph from 0 to 10 seconds is greater than 100 m.
The distance fallen during the first 10 seconds is greater than 100 meters.
